name: SPIN Ultra GTX Trail Running Shoe - Men's

features: Fabric and welded PU upper with a GORE-TEX invisible fit lining for lightweight waterproof-breathable protection
Sock-Fit LW construction reduces bulk and enhances fit
TPU toe cap offers outstanding trail protection
6mm drop midsole with TPU insert for cushion and protection
Vibram Megagrip outsole features outstanding traction.
